ascelion.merkle

Class TreeLeaf<T,S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ascelion.merkle.TreeLeaf<T,S>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataSlice

    public class TreeLeaf<T,S>
extends Object
    A leaf of the Merkle tree.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TreeLeaf(T hash, S content)
      Constructs a leaf from a hash and some additional information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<T> getChain()
      Gets the whole hash chain of this leaf, starting with the hash of this leaf, continuing with the list of the siblings/uncles and ending with the hash of the root.
      S getContent()
      Gets the data associated to this leaf.
      T hash()
      Gets the hash value of this node.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TreeLeaf

        public TreeLeaf(T hash,
                S content)
        Constructs a leaf from a hash and some additional information.

        The content doesn't have any particular meaning for this implementation and is not checked in any way, but it typically represents the data whose hash value is passed to the hash parameter.

        Parameters:
        hash - the hash of this leaf
        content - data associated to this leaf

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        public final S getContent()
        Gets the data associated to this leaf.
        Returns:
        the data associated to this leaf.

      • getChain

        public final List<T> getChain()
        Gets the whole hash chain of this leaf, starting with the hash of this leaf, continuing with the list of the siblings/uncles and ending with the hash of the root.
        Returns:
        the whole validation chain.

      • hash

        public final T hash()
        Gets the hash value of this node.
        Returns:
        the hash value.
